results.title: Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia.
results.text_hl: CASE SUMMARY: A 72-year-old white man, with transfusion-dependent refractory @DISEASE_Anemia @DISEASE_MESH:D000740 @@@anemia@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Ring_Chromosomes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012303 @@@ringed sideroblasts@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, was started on @CHEMICAL_Thalidomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013792 @@@thalidomide@@@ 100 mg at bedtime.

citations.NLM: Kaur A, Yu SS, Lee AJ, Chiao TB. Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia. Ann Pharmacother. 2003 Jul-Aug;37(7-8):1040-3. PMID: 12841816
citations.BibTeX: @article{12841816, title={Thalidomide-induced sinus bradycardia.}, author={Kaur A and Yu SS and Lee AJ and Chiao TB}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={37}, number={7-8}, pages={1040-3}}
